text: Ksenia Leonidovna Khairova (, born Talyzina (); March 29, 1969) is a Soviet and Russian stage and movie actress. == Biography == === Early life === Ksenia Leonidovna Talyzina was born in Moscow on March 29, 1969. Her parents divorced shortly after her birth. She went school with in-depth study of languages. In 1990 she graduated GITIS (Eugeny Lazarev's rate). === Career === Her first role was a small part in the movie Nikolai Vavilov. She is actress TSATRA. She now acts mostly in series. === Personal life === She divorced Khairov. They have a daughter, Anastasia Talyzina (born in 1999).Ксения Хаирова — биография — российские актриса — КиноПоиск.РУ == Filmography == * 1990 — "Nikolai Vavilov"/"Николай Вавилов" — episode * 1992 — "Our American Borya"/"Наш американский Боря" — Anna * 1990 — "Nikolai Vavilov"/"Николай Вавилов" — episode * 1992 — "Our American Borya"/"Наш американский Боря" — Anna * 1997 — "At the dawn of a misty youth"/"На заре туманной юности" — Anna * 2004 — "Opera.
